title: Aliens of the Deep
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walden Media, James Cameron and Steven Quale
brief_description: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet’s most unique life forms.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.
